miniapp.name: Base Candy
miniapp.subtitle: Match, Play, Mint on Base
miniapp.description: Match your favorite Layer 2 logos in this addictive puzzle game! Compete on the leaderboard and mint your scorecard as an NFT on Base blockchain. The sweetest crypto gaming experience!
miniapp.ogTitle: Base Candy - Match & Mint on Base
miniapp.ogDescription: The sweetest crypto puzzle game! Match L2 logos, climb the leaderboard, and mint your scorecard NFT on Base.
